snippet: The sixth floor of a building on East 191st Street became the setting of a fire that left three people in critical condition.
abstract: The sixth floor of a building on East 191st Street became the setting of a fire that left three people in critical condition.

headline.main: Firefighters Rescue 2 Children and Their Father in the Bronx
headline.print_headline: Firefighters Rescue Three In Bronx Apartment Blaze
